title: Tech of the Tour de France, part 2
content:
Tech of the Tour de France, part 2

The Tour de France is always a hotbed for new tech, and this year is not disappointing. In this video, we look into the tech of the Tour with new bikes from Pinarello and Cervelo, Chris Froome’s equipment choices, and the updated Canyon handlebars. We also get hands-on with some fancy shoes and a new helmet.
